title: 83/510/EEC: Commission Decision of 7 October 1983 establishing that the apparatus described as 'Varian - Gas Chromatograph, model 3740, with accessories' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 7 October 1983
establishing that the apparatus described as 'Varian - Gas Chromatograph, model 3740, with accessories' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
(83/510/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as 'Varian - Gas Chromatograph, model 3740, with accessories', which is the subject of an application by Belgium of 5 April 1983, may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 October 1983.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 184, 15. 7. 1975, p. 1.
